## Demo Description
What demo or tutorial would you like to see?

## Use Case
Describe the use case or problem this demo would help solve.

## Proposed Approach
If you have ideas on how this demo should be implemented, describe them here.

## Technologies
Which technologies should this demo showcase? (e.g., Kubernetes, NVIDIA, MCP, etc.)

## Complexity Level
How complex should this demo be?
- [ ] Beginner
- [ ] Intermediate
- [ ] Advanced

## Additional Context
Any other information, requirements, or examples for this demo?

## Checklist
- [ ] I have searched for existing demo requests
